name: World of Code
description:
The game is about teaching a basic algorithm using drag and drop block to move the character towards the goal while also attacking an enemy along the way

How to Play

use the move block in the middle of the stage and put it to the block on the right. After you put the block in a correct order, you can move the character based on your move block by using the run button on the bottom left of the screen. Wait until the character reach of the goal or hitting an obstacle.
